description: Alchemy is the practice of binding magic to items or creating magical substances. This includes enchanting objects with special properties. Alchemy is the replacement of industry in this setting.
See page 57 in the Genesys Core Rulebook.
See page 57 in the Genesys Core Rulebook.

There is an invisible but tangible natural force that swims around in the space-between-space that individuals can tap into. Anything is possible with Arcana magic. It is the practice of interacting with the mysterious and wondrous magical winding streams of Arcana energy.
See page 70 in the Genesys Core Rulebook.

Geography, History, Languages, Literature, Political Science, Philosophy and Theology. All knowledges and things regarding mortals and their society.
Sciences, such as Agricultural, Biology, Ecology, Chemistry, Geology, Meteorology, and Physics.

This centers around the super natural forces of the world, such as the Arcana, Divine and Primal forces. Every mention in the rulebook to Knowledge in relation to Magic, this is the skill that rulebook should be referring to.

Knowledge which stems from predictable and repeatable patterns and various man-made applications. Examples include, but not limited to, Construction, Law, Engineering, Mathematics, War, Logistics, and Administrative affairs.
